container-title: clothing in The Booke of Margery Kempe, and the use of the term “regard” in Milton’s Paradise Lost
title: A 2010 graduate of the Hudson Strode Program in Renaissance Studies at the University of Alabama, she also holds an M.F.A. in Creative Writing from Georgia College & State University. Her poems have appeared in Roger and Rhino. Her most recent research interests include homosocial relationships and representations in medieval and early modern lyric poetry
